name: The Butler Did It (Artoomics - Eleonora)
description:
The butler unintentionally let loose a bunch of monsters in the mansion, help him get rid of them and save everyone! 

WASD to move - L Mouse to shoot - 1,2,3,4,5,6 to change weapon / use inventory

Game submitted for the  Game Off 2022  Jam

Theme: Cliché

Made by our team Artoomics
